alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 3:18PM CDT until April 20 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 318 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles north of Green Forest, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Green Forest... Rule... Urbanette... Coin... Denver... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
